replies.body: I won a UE Miniboom from a competition and I must say, it is extremely powerful for such a small device - the sound quality is sublime, the portability is great and overall the usability makes it worth the money if you want to buy it. I actively use it for a variety of different reasons and the exterior is pretty durable. So I expect a set of UE Megabooms should float your boat for above average sound quality and portability.

I don't know much about speakers but the best speakers I have seen are these:

The only reason I didn't want them is because I barely even use my speakers, and mainly use headphones.)
